name: .OVERLAY File Extension
summary: Learn about .OVERLAY files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can import an OVERLAY file into Streamlabs Desktop (Windows, Mac). To do so:
Navigate to and import your OVERLAY file.
The scenes and resources included in your OVERLAY file will then appear in Streamlabs Desktop, where you'll be able to edit them as needed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
